mapper.select: select studentId,money,passwd from t_u_stuaccount where studentId = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update t_u_stuaccount
studentId = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
money = #{money, jdbcType=INTEGER},
passwd = #{passwd, jdbcType=INTEGER},
where studentId = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT tt.studentId,tt.idNumber,tt.name,tt.sex,tt.age,tt.hometown,tt.phoneNum,tt.mailBox,tt.headIcon,tt.password,tt.course1,tt.course2,tt.course3,tt.course4,tt.studyDis, tt.registerTime,tt.bankcardNum,tt.bankName,tt.bankAccName,tt.idPhotoFront,tt.idPhotoBack,tt.isImport,tt.importSrc,tt.stuCoachEmpID,tt.applyCarType, tt.eventState,tt.eventDesc,tt.checkIdState,tt.schoolId,tt.syncType,tt.syncTime,tt.drLicence,tt.drPhoto,tt.drPhoto2,tt.drType,tt.drExpires,tt.agreement,tt.applyexam, tt.pwstate,tt.cityId,tt.applystate,tt.applyorder,tt.applyttid,tt.flowNo, tt.idNation,tt.idBirthday,tt.idAddr,tt.idExpires,tt.drNation,tt.drAddr,tt.drFirst,tt.drFileNo,tt.checkDriveIdState,tt.openId,tt.vipId,tt.state,tt.reviveTime FROM t_u_student tt WHERE tt.studentId IN (SELECT t.studentId FROM t_u_mycoaches t WHERE 1 = 1 and t.coachId = #{coachId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.status = 0 and t.type = 1) and (tt.course4 is null or tt.course4 != 100) limit #{pageNo, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_u_stuaccount (studentId,money,passwd) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{money, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_u_stuaccount where studentId = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select studentId as studentId,idNumber as idNumber,name as name,sex as sex,age as age,hometown as hometown,phoneNum as phoneNum,mailBox as mailBox,headIcon as headIcon,password as password,course1 as course1,course2 as course2,course3 as course3,course4 as course4,studyDis as studyDis,registerTime as registerTime,bankcardNum as bankcardNum,bankName as bankName,bankAccName as bankAccName,idPhotoFront as idPhotoFront,idPhotoBack as idPhotoBack,isImport as isImport,importSrc as importSrc,stuCoachEmpID as stuCoachEmpID,applyCarType as applyCarType,eventState as eventState,eventDesc as eventDesc,checkIdState as checkIdState,schoolId as schoolId,syncType as syncType,syncTime as syncTime,drLicence as drLicence,drPhoto as drPhoto,drPhoto2 as drPhoto2,drType as drType,drExpires as drExpires,agreement as agreement,applyexam as applyexam,pwstate as pwstate,cityId as cityId,applystate as applystate,applyorder as applyorder,applyttid as applyttid,flowNo as flowNo,idNation as idNation,idBirthday as idBirthday,idAddr as idAddr,idExpires as idExpires,drNation as drNation,drAddr as drAddr,drFirst as drFirst,drFileNo as drFileNo,checkDriveIdState as checkDriveIdState,openId as openId,extra as extra,vipId as vipId,state as state,reviveTime as reviveTime,vipPackageId as vipPackageId, firstLogin, lastLogin, basicHour2, testHour2, simTestHour2, basicHour3, testHour3, simTestHour3, driveHour, packageId, relevanceTime, qqOpenId from t_u_student
